column5: Hey Everyone,  Heading out on Thursday and I haven't been in this area for over 10 years..  Does anyone have any info on launches and where to start.. I've been looking for some sort of map to help me out, but can't find any..  I remember a site that had a general map of the harbour but can't remember it's name...  Any help would be greatly appreciated..  Tiz
You can launch out of the provincial park or Woods Bay, or technically Arnolds Bay (even though it is the furthest away).  :-)
To launch at the park you have to book a campsite, otherwise you can launch at the Moon River Marina. I think that they charge $20 now.
bring your wallet.  I always just drove down to the end of the road, there are a few launches down there.  Pretty much all of them were $20 last time I was there and that was a few years ago.
